title: Short break for two
text:
This hotel is a stones throw away to the subway and about 10 mins walk to time square (That's at my pace anyway lol). The staff are extremely friendly and the rooms are comfortable and the beds are s soft.
The roof top terrace is beyond belief, it's so beautiful we could have stayed up there forever.
Breakfast I thought would be your normal toast and cereal but oh no there was waffles, muffins, toast, eggs, sausage, fruit you name it it was there and plenty of it.
We arranged a taxi to take us to JFK which was a little late which made us a little nervous but the staff went out of his was, ran into the street and hailed us a taxi to get us there on time. Thanks just brilliant customer service.
The only thing I was unaware of was the hotel asks for a holding fee when you check in, in case you break anything. On check out it is released to you but I was told you have to wait about two weeks to get it back.So this I have to wait for.
We had a fantastic stay and would really recommend this hotel to all.
Room Tip: Ask for the highest floors with city views See more room tips
